titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National HIV Testing Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/27/2005--Introduced. Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National HIV/AIDS Testing Day. Encourages the use of rapid test kits approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for HIV testing. Recognizes the need to: (1) promptly reauthorize the Ryan White CARE Act; and (2) authorize and provide all necessary funding to prevent the spread of HIV and to provide care and treatment to those who are already infected and living with HIV/AIDS.
